mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Cherington, David W.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Camba, Jackson Co., O [Camba, Jackson County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Cherington, David W. Patient Age: 30. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of internal condyle of right femer [femur]. Ball entered in poplatial [popliteal] space and lodged in internal condyle comminuting the internal condyle. . Location Wounded: Fisher's Hill, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/22. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Treatment: Amputation [1864] 09/22 on the field. Middle third of thigh. Simple dressing. Stump healed.. Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospital Gallipolis 1864/12/06.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cherington, David W.
Gun shot fracture of internal condyle of right femer [femur]. Ball entered in poplatial [popliteal] space and lodged in internal condyle comminuting the internal condyle.
